name: Clubhouse Games™ Express: Card Classics
description: Clubhouse Games comes to DSiWare with a collection of five fun card games in Clubhouse Games Express: Card Classics. Play familiar favorites like Blackjack and Five Card Draw or test your ability in the fast-paced Last Card, Last Card Plus, and President. DS Download Play allows players to host as many as seven friends.
disclaimer: This game content was previously released as part of Clubhouse Games for Nintendo DS.
